Employees study test site Treatment Subjects Inclusion Criteria 18 year age old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < = 30 kg/m2 Exclusion Criteria Pregnancy Open wound ( sore , cut , ulcer , etc . ) around waist , hip and/or thigh Currently treat cancerous growth around waist , hip and/or thigh
